column4: tomorrow i want to migrate from gentoo to ubuntu eft; keeping my /home-partition will be a walk in the park, right...?
yes... you'll simply need to fstab your home partition to /home
well, personally, I think gentoo is nice - especially if you like updates faster than every 6 months
my problem with gentoo, which i have been using for a couple of years is (not unexpected) (1) compiling, which takes ages, and (2) wanting to have a bleeding edge (somewhat...) system...
